# {{< bi people >}} Meetings organized by RTUG

Meetings and events are organized and shared via [Meetup.com](https://www.meetup.com/r-trento-users-group/).

Participation is **free and open to everyone**, provided that you sign up for the meeting on [Meetup.com](https://meetup.com).
